text: Carterica pygmaea is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Bates in 1881. It is known from Costa Rica, Nicaragua, and Panama.BioLib.cz - Carterica pygmaea. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1881
title: Carterica pygmaea
